description_expanded: Scentworx Pineapple Passion 3-Wick Jar Candle by Slatkin & Co (14.5oz) is designed to deliver everyday reliability with thoughtful details suited for home fragrance. A highly fragrant 3-wick jar candle with a tropical Pineapple Passion scent. By Slatkin & Co for Scentworx. Built for convenience and value, it balances quality materials with practical features you can rely on at home, on the go, or as a thoughtful gift.
